item.title: Hamburger dressing
item.description:
A delicious home made hamburger dressing 🍔

  • ⏲️ Prep time: 1 min
  • 🍳 Cook time: 1 min

Ingredients

  • 3 tbsp mayonnese or aioli
  • 2 tbsp ketchup
  • 1 tbsp sriracha
  • 1 clove garlic, if using mayonnese and not aioli (optional)

Directions

  1. Mix ingredients in a bowl
